name: SampleRowKey
title: Google
Cloud
Bigtable
SampleRowKey
description: • offset_bytes : Approximate total storage space used by all rows in the table which precede row_key. Buffering the contents of all rows between two subsequent samples would require space roughly equal to the difference in their offset_bytes fields.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

bigtable = Google::Cloud::Bigtable.new

table = bigtable.table("my-instance", "my-table")

table.sample_row_keys.each do |r|
  p r
end
